text: @NYGovCuomo I am listening and staying safe but I am truly concerned about the lack of help that the government is giving all the people. Including the lack of support for the Native Americans.  Please encourage them to help as they need help, The CV-19 hit them too. https://t.co/TsMOxtW8Wd
